description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_DX table holds the diagnoses for the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CLM_DX_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds the qualifier identifying the code set for the claim diagnoses.

columns.name: CLM_DX
columns.description: This item holds the diagnoses for the claim. The principal diagnosis is stored on the first line and the other diagnoses are on subsequent lines.

columns.name: CLM_DX_POA
columns.description: This item identifies if the diagnosis was present when the patient was admitted.

columns.name: CLM_DX_CODE_SET_OID
columns.description: The object ID (OID) for the diagnosis code set.

columns.name: CLM_DX_RANK
columns.description: This item holds the explicit rank of the diagnoses when it is present in the raw claims data.
